definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_in_bed</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="is_equipped"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:AllNightMask</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tp ~ ~ ~</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You can't sleep with this mask keeping your eyes open</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
